item.title: Jframe Help
item.dc:creator: @imhewbrew imhewbrew
item.description:
@imhewbrew wrote:

i get an error from my jframe when i come pile here is error and text

Text:

public URL getCodeBase()
{
    return new URL((new StringBuilder()).append("http://").append(server).append("/cache").toString());
    Exception exception;
    exception;
    return super.getCodeBase();
}

Error:

Jframe.java:84: not a statement
exception;
^
1 error
Press any key to continue . . .

Read full topic
